$documentation.purpose: Inventory of all client materials available for discovery analysis. Categorizes files by type and tracks processing status.
$documentation.phase_position: Created at CP0 during material scanning

key_attributes.inventory_date: ISO timestamp when inventory was created
key_attributes.categories: Breakdown of materials by type (interviews, pdfs, screenshots, videos)
key_attributes.total_processable_files: Count of files that can be analyzed
key_attributes.total_skipped: Count of files that will be skipped (videos, etc.)

validation_rules: inventory_date MUST be a valid ISO timestamp
total_processable_files MUST equal sum of processable category counts
